results.cleanName: Innistrad Crimson Vow Commander Deck Display

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
KEY FEATURES:
• 4 Innistrad: Crimson Vow Commander Decks, with 2 of each deck—2 Spirit Squadron + 2 Vampiric Bloodline
• Each ready-to-play deck contains 100 Magic cards (2 traditional foil + 98 nonfoil)
• Both decks come with 1 foil-etched Display Commander, 10 tokens, 1 life tracker + 1 deck box
• Spirit Squadron and Vampiric Bloodline each introduce 15 MTG cards not found in the main set
• Reduced-plastic packaging
Details coming soon!

results.name: Innistrad: Crimson Vow - Commander Deck Display

results.cleanName: Innistrad Crimson Vow Commander Deck Vampiric Bloodline Minimal Packaging

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
KEY FEATURES:
• Packaging reduced by 45% for less waste
• 100-card ready-to-play Innistrad: Crimson Vow Commander deck
• Deck includes 2 traditional foils + 98 nonfoil cards
• 1 foil-etched Display Commander
• 10 double-sided tokens + life tracker
• Introduces 15 MTG cards not found in the main set

DESCRIPTION:
This minimally-packaged version of the Vampiric Bloodline Innistrad: Crimson Vow Commander Deck includes all the same contents but with 45% less packaging waste and 98% less plastic than previous Commander decks. Each box contains 1 ready-to-play deck of 100 Magic cards (2 traditional foil, 98 nonfoil), 1 foil-etched Display Commander (a thick cardstock copy of the commander card with textured foil etched into the card’s border and art), 10 double-sided tokens, 1 deck box (can hold 100 sleeved cards), 1 life tracker, and 1 reference card.

results.name: Innistrad: Crimson Vow Commander Deck - Vampiric Bloodline (Minimal Packaging)
